name: Hidden Tunes
description:
You are an archaeologist and have heard of a great treasure of immense value, a Mythical Music Instrument. You have started this adventure discovering in each level a piece of its melody.

Hidden Tunes is a puzzle game of movement pattern commands to play through each level. It have very nice graphics and an amazing music.  

It's currently a three levels game and future levels will come depending of comments and audience reaction.

This game is all ages recommended.

Music link will be released soon in Caribbean Sea Sound Patreon.

This is officially the first game of 3 Head Monkey (@3headmonkeyx)

https://3headmonkey.com

The game was created by:

Coco_Monki (@coco_monki) 

https://www.patreon.com/coco_monki

Music created by:

Charly_Poe & Caribbean Sea Sound (@charly_poe) (@caribbeanseasound)

Please follow us on instagram

Thank you for playing ! ! !
